All Implemented Interfaces:
BlackboardClient, Component, SubscriptionLifeCycle, PluginBase, GenericStateModel
public class RootMobilityPlugin
extends AbstractMobilityPlugin

This component coordinates agent mobility and handles agent add/remove requests.
